DbDetails.DbTable: xbs.sys_process_flow_line s left join xbs.sys_process_flow_line s0 on s.next_line_seq_pass=s0.sys_process_flow_line_id left join xbs.sys_process_flow_line s1 on s.next_line_seq_fail=s1.sys_process_flow_line_id left join xbs.sys_process_flow_line s2 on s.next_line_seq_onhold=s2.sys_process_flow_line_id left join xbs.user_v u on s.created_by=u.xerp_user_id left join xbs.user_v u0 on s.last_update_by=u0.xerp_user_id
